entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @VP
The spread has NOT slowed. We are STILL in the 1ST wave!! 1000 people are DYING Daily!
Dr Fauci: "When you have 20,000+ infections per day, can't talk about a 2nd wave. “We’re in the first wave. Let’s get out of the 1st wave before you have a 2nd wave”
https://t.co/2OmdqVPDT3
